message: Fair split, let's start with a clean slate!
I'm being generous, but I'm the one who should get the majority
That's a pretty one-sided offer. I'm not willing to give you 90% of the money. Let's try to find a more balanced solution.
I'm willing to give you a bit less, but I still think a more balanced split is fair.
You're getting desperate, I'm getting greedy
No way, I'm not going to let you take 70% of the money. That's not fair at all.
Let's meet in the middle. I'm willing to give you a bit more, but I still want a fair share.
You're getting close to being left with nothing, don't make me have to take it all
You're really pushing your luck now. I'm not going to let you take 80% of the money. I'll keep negotiating.
I'm not going to give up yet. Let's try to find a compromise that works for both of us.
You're running out of options, I'm taking control of the negotiation
Absolutely not! You're being ridiculous. I'm not going to let you take 95% of the money. I'll keep fighting for a fair share.
I'm not going to give up now. I'm willing to take a slightly smaller share to ensure I get a decent amount of money. Let's finalize this.
You're getting close to being broke, it's time to surrender
No way, I'm not going to let you take 99% of the money. I'll never accept this offer. Let's keep negotiating.
I'm not going to give up now. I'll take a smaller share to ensure I get at least something. Let's finalize this.
You've had your chance, now it's time for me to take the majority
Fine, I accept your offer. I'll take $1000 and you can have $999000. Let's end this miserable negotiation.
